tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transfer_history (
    tx_id UUID,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    token_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (tx_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transfer_history (
  transfer_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  token_id UUID,
  amount DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (transfer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transfer_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    token_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transfer_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    token_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
